official_title: To amend the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 to prohibit the use of certain grants for a project which desecrates or denigrates a religious or national symbol.
subjects: Federal aid to the arts and humanities

summary.text: Amends the National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Act of 1965 to prohibit the use of certain grants for a project which desecrates or denigrates a religious or national symbol.

titles.title: To amend the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 to prohibit the use of certain grants for a project which desecrates or denigrates a religious or national symbol.
